title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 263.9 - Administrative law judge and hearing officer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 263.9 - Administrative law judge and hearing officer

State Regulations

The terms
administrative law judge
or
hearing officer
shall mean any agent of the board so
designated by the chair or their designee and shall include the director and
assistant director of PEPR. As used in these rules, the terms
administrative law judge
and
hearing officer
are interchangeable. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
263.9

Adopted

New

York State Register February 15, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 07, eff. 2/15/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
